page.title: 10SHOPPING IN SHEFFIELD
page.content: In Sheffield are{Sheaf Market}and {Castle Market,}open most days, selling food, clothes and general items, also an outdoor market open on Monday for second hand stalls and on Tuesday, Friday and Saturday for clothing and general items. Central Sheffield has many large department stores.{Fargate}has been turned into a pedestrian area with trees, plants and benches which makes it more pleasant.{Castle Square}is known as{'The Hole In The Road'}and is a safe area for pedestrians. It is underneath a roundabout and has many display windows and some shops. The{City Clipper}is a free bus service connecting railway and bus stations to shopping areas.
